name: Shooting Gunner Challenge2018
description:
Shooting Gunner Challenge 2018 is the first-person shooter that all players like criticals,popp,bullet party,polywar game,warfield shooter. Is the best of the latest shoot attacking action games and counter terriost open war. If you want to fight in the real battlefield and modern warfare style, choose to install this game
Features:
Addictive gameplay physics
Free to play
Challenging and thrilling missions to accomplish
Realistic background sound effects
Various advance sniper weapons to use
